isis.stitle: 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES FS-5106 AND FS-6206 - INSTALL

step1.para: Carefully lower countershaft into case ( Figure 104).
Turn the transmission case on end as shown ( Figure 105). Position countershaft assembly into front bearing race.

figure.caption: Figure 105. Turn Transmission Case on End

step1.para: Use grease on the reverse idler thrust washers to hold in place ( Figure 106). Position tangs of washers in the groove of the housing.

figure.caption: Figure 106. Use Grease on Reverse Idler Thrust Washers to Hold in Place

step1.para: Install bearings and spacer in the reverse idler gear (inset, Figure 107) and position gear in housing with long hub of gear toward the front.

figure.caption: Figure 107. Install Bearings and Spacer and Position Reverse Idler Gear in Housing

step1.para: Insert idler shaft through case and idler gear bearings ( Figure 108). Line up notch in shaft with notch in case, install lock ball and drive shaft into position (inset).

figure.caption: Figure 108. Insert Idler Shaft Through Case and Drive Shaft into Position

step1.para: Install countershaft rear bearing race into case as shown ( Figure 109).

figure.caption: Figure 109. Install Countershaft Rear Bearing Race into Case

step1.para: Temporarily install new shims into bearing retainer (inset, Figure 110). Install retainer. Tighten set screws to 5 to 10 ft-lbs. (7 to 14 N · m).

figure.caption: Figure 110. Install New Shims into Bearing Retainer and Install Retainer

note.para: Lube hole in retainer must line up with lube hole in case.

step1.para: Rotate countershaft to seat bearings and races ( Figure 111). Position dial indicator as shown and lift countershaft to measure end play. End play must be set at .006 to .010 inch (0.15 to 0.25 mm). Add shims for more end play and remove shims for less end play.

figure.caption: Figure 111. Rotate Countershaft to Seat Bearings and Races

note.para: Once end play is correct, remove retainer and apply a light coat of Loctite 510 to both sides of shims and face of retainer.

step1.para: Coat threads of set screws with Loctite 262 and re-tighten.

Install countershaft rear bearing cover and gasket ( Figure 112). Coat threads of bolts with Loctite 262 and tighten to 20 to 30 ft-lbs. (27 to 41 N · m). Tip transmission to horizontal position to install mainshaft.

figure.caption: Figure 112. Install Countershaft Rear Bearing Cover and Gasket
